content.question: In line 2, densior specifies that the ash was becoming

choices.label: as thick as it was anywhere
less thick than it was before
the thickest it ever had been
more thick than it was previously

content.answer: more thick than it was previously

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
